portfolio.title: Giftune
portfolio.description: Use email 'chantal@email.com' and password 'admin' to add gifts and check off gifts in wishlists on this full-stack birthday gift registry web app.

portfolio.title: Youtube 2.0
portfolio.description: In this project I used youtube data API to recreate a starter version of it's website with functional search box, video play and comment section.

portfolio.title: Color Contrast Checker
portfolio.description: In this frontend project I created a bento box style layout with UI elements. I learned how color swatches where implimented and luminance is calculated.
